title: Bowling Pin Hat
description: Strike! Double! Turkey! A Perfect Game! This playful pin hat will have you feeling like you're at the lanes in now time! Just watch out for any fearsome bowling balls heading your way! ðŸ˜‚

title: Pirate Captain Hat
description: Arrgh matey! If you don't buy this epic pirate hat and swab the deck I'll make you walk the plank! Arrgh!

title: Poop Emoji Hat
description: Celebrate your love of the funniest emoji ever designed with this humorous poop hat. Dazzle your friends with your fecal flair!

title: Shark Hat
description: Aaaahh! This frightened fellow seems to have fallen victim to our scary shark hat! Buy it for yourself, if you dare....ðŸ˜±

title: Gary the Snail shoes
description: "Meow!" Woah, oh my god did I just hear these shoes talk. Hahah, just kidding! It's Gary the Snail! Show your status as a Bobhead with these Gary shoes!

title: Geometric Shoes
description: Become a Geometrical Dominator with these colorful kicks! Give someone one look at these and they'll be driven to "Stereo Madness" (a level from the Geometry Dash game!).

title: Shrek Shoes
description: Hey now, I'm a believer in these stylish Shrek shoes! These shoes, in all their green glory, certainly won't make you an ogre! Donkey!

title: "The Chompers"
description: Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare Nightmare

title: Inflatable Shoes
description: Need to go for a swim? Well, you don't want to get your shoes soaked, silly! You NEED these inflatable kicks to get where you need to go, just the way a sea creature would! Surfs up, buddy!

title: Clown Shoes
description: Hey, circus in town? Nope, not at all. That statement is egregiously and erroneously wrong actually, and you should be embarassed for even thinking such a thing. I can understand your confusion though, as these are our comical clown shoes! You should buy these if you need some clowning in your life.
